Event.name: Be_on_alert
Event.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Protagonist</fen> has become aware of a possible <fen>Danger</fen> (a dangerous event or a <fen>Dangerous_entity</fen> that might participate in an event harmful to the <fen>Protagonist</fen>) and is ready to engage in an <fen>Activity</fen> in response to that <fen>Danger</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Protagonist">All tropps</fex> are on <fex name="Degree">high</fex> <t>alert</t> <fex name="Dangerous_entity">for possible intruders</fex> <fex name="Time">following an attack on a nearby compound</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Protagonist">we</fex>'re on <t>alert</t> <fex name="Activity">to stop anyone trying to sneak in</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Protagonist">we</fex>'re on <t>guard</t> <fex name="Danger">for possible sabotage</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Protagonist
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Protagonist</fen> who is prepared to undertake some action in response to a <fen>Danger</fen>.
<ex><fex name="pro">Troops</fex> are on high <t>alert</t> following a string of bombings downtown.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Activity
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The action that the <fen>Protagonist</fen> is prepared to do.
<ex>You should be on <t>alert</t> <fex name="act">to evacuate within 30 minutes of hearing the siren</fex> .</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The time when the <fen>Protagonist</fen> is on alert to the potential Danger.
<ex>They're on <t>alert</t> <fex name="tim">now</fex> .</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Result
Arg.definition: <def-root>The state or event that follows due to the ready state. </def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The length of time that the <fen>Protagonist</fen> remains ready to perform the <fen>Activity</fen>.
<ex>We have been on <t>guard</t> <fex name="dur">for a long time</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Degree</fen> to which the <fen>Protagonist</fen> is wary of the possible Danger and ready to perform an <fen>Activity</fen>.
<ex>All our soldiers are now on <fex name="Degree">high</fex> <t>alert</t>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Danger
Arg.definition:
<def-root>A dangerous event or situation which teh <fen>Protagonist</fen> is aware of and is ready to respond to.
<ex>We were all on <t>guard</t> <fex name="dan">for possible attempts to sabotage the operation</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Dangerous_entity
Arg.definition:
<def-root>An entity of which the <fen>Protagonist</fen> is aware and which poses a danger.
<ex>Be on <t>alert</t> <fex name="dan_ent">for tigers</fex>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: alert.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a state of readiness to act in response to a negative event or situation.

lexUnit.name: guard.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a protective stance or outlook, readiness against a possible danger.
